message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.SOC, cs.HC 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it deals with the problem of recommending items to groups of users. It could also belong to the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category as it involves forming appropriate groups of users. The paper presents a formal model and algorithm for solving the problem, which suggests that it could also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the implications of the problem for human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and social computing (cs.SOC), which further supports the likelihood of these sub-categories.
